body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, cidom))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, ccrg))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, cdomn))
-| wb(wcel(c0, cidom), wa(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, cdomn)))

⊢ (c0 ∈ Field → c0 ∈ IDomn)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Field → c0 ∈ CRing)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Field → c0 ∈ Domn)
⊣ (c0 ∈ IDomn ↔(c0 ∈ CRing ∧ c0 ∈ Domn))
